# Complete Documentation Index

This page provides a comprehensive index of all StreamTV documentation organized by category and skill level.

## ğŸ“š Documentation by Skill Level

### Beginner Level
- **[Beginner Guide](../docs/BEGINNER_GUIDE.md)** - For users new to IPTV and streaming
  - What is StreamTV?
  - Basic concepts and terminology
  - Simple setup and usage
  - Common tasks step-by-step
  - Basic troubleshooting

### Intermediate Level
- **[Intermediate Guide](../docs/INTERMEDIATE_GUIDE.md)** - For technicians and administrators
  - Architecture overview
  - Configuration details
  - YAML file structure
  - Channel and schedule management
  - Advanced troubleshooting
  - Script usage

### Expert Level
- **[Expert Guide](../docs/EXPERT_GUIDE.md)** - For developers and engineers
  - Complete system architecture
  - Component interactions
  - Code structure and patterns
  - Advanced configuration
  - Customization and extension
  - Deep troubleshooting

## Quick Navigation

- **New to StreamTV?** Start with [Beginner Guide](../docs/BEGINNER_GUIDE.md) or [Quick Start](Quick-Start)
- **Setting up?** See [Installation](Installation) or [macOS Installation](../INSTALL_MACOS.md)
- **Configuring?** Check [Configuration](Configuration) and [YAML Validation](../docs/YAML_VALIDATION.md)
- **Using API?** Read [API Reference](API-Reference) and [API Guide](../docs/API.md)
- **Creating schedules?** See [Schedules](Schedules) and [Schedule Creator](../scripts/README_SCHEDULE_CREATOR.md)
- **Troubleshooting?** Check [Troubleshooting](Troubleshooting) and [Troubleshooting Scripts](../docs/TROUBLESHOOTING_SCRIPTS.md)
- **Integrating?** See [HDHomeRun Integration](HDHomeRun-Integration) or [ErsatzTV Integration](../docs/ERSATZTV_INTEGRATION.md)

---

**Note**: This index links to both wiki pages and direct documentation files. Wiki pages provide quick reference, while the documentation files in `docs/` contain comprehensive details.
